sub_title: Cardiac Implantable Device Specialist / Product Manager Medical Devices
summary:
Available for a part-time position in a technical-clinical role, education, consultancy or product management in the medical device market, with a preference for cardiology, neurostimulation, neuromodulation, patient monitoring or telemedicine. Also open for positions in other medical device markets. Strong analytical and customer focused professional with 23 years of experience in the cardiac medical device technology market, including customer consultation and education, strategic and tactical marketing, product management, device implantation/follow-up and post market surveillance. Excellent skills in product introductions, customer training and education, market analysis, portfolio management. Currently finalizing a study neuropsychology

Specialties:
Cardiac medical device technology
Cardiac implantable device therapy, implantation and follow-up
Physician and patient needs of medical devices
Medical device product management
Medical device marketing
Medical device product launches
Customer and sales training and education
Medical device market development
Cardiology market
Electronic medical devices and telecommunications
Medical device product quality
Post market surveillance of medical devices
